2.6.3: ✨ Feature: Added new 'Resend Rejected Wagelist' automation to reprocess payments for bank-rejected transactions.
✨ Feature: Added a folder share option in the File Manager.
✨ Improvement: Overhauled 'Jobcard Verification' with a 'Process all villages' option and fixed all critical photo upload bugs.
✨ Improvement: The footer status bar is now dynamic, showing real-time automation progress and server connectivity.
✨ Improvement: Updated the layout of the 'Delete Work Allocation' tab for a better user experience.
